movie.title: Short Cuts
movie.description_intro: While helicopters overhead spray against a Medfly infestation a group of Los Angeles lives intersect, some casually, some to more lasting effect. Whilst they go out to concerts and jazz clubs and even have their pools cleaned, they also lie, drink, and cheat. Death itself seems never to be far away, even on a fishing trip.
movie.description_full: While helicopters overhead spray against a Medfly infestation a group of Los Angeles lives intersect, some casually, some to more lasting effect. Whilst they go out to concerts and jazz clubs and even have their pools cleaned, they also lie, drink, and cheat. Death itself seems never to be far away, even on a fishing trip.

movies.title: Sanctuary
movies.summary: A young free-minded German 14 year old boy in a northern Lower Saxony province town is in love with his mother. His stepfather identifies him as a competitor, and has him brought to a boarding school run by a Christian organisation. The headmaster is a psychotic person. The headmaster, and his employees want to break him, and all the other boys there as well. Tortured and hard working he decides to flee. Rioting and fearless he flees, makes his way back to his hometown only to find that his mother and stepfather won't believe his story, betray him to extradite him again to the boarding school. After months his stepfather dies unexpected and mama wants him back. There is no way back home - only the away from all the people who betrayed him to find his own way in this world.

movies.title: Cold Light of Day
movies.summary: Fictionalized account based on the actions of serial killer Dennis Nilsen.
movies.description_full: Fictionalized account based on the actions of serial killer Dennis Nilsen.
movies.synopsis: Fictionalized account based on the actions of serial killer Dennis Nilsen.

movies.title: Small Time
movies.summary: A young guy decides to skip college in favor of joining his father on the lot of his used-car business.
movies.description_full: A young guy decides to skip college in favor of joining his father on the lot of his used-car business.
movies.synopsis: A young guy decides to skip college in favor of joining his father on the lot of his used-car business.

movies.title: From Paris with Love
movies.summary: James Reece is an ambitious aide to the U.S. Ambassador in Paris, doing little jobs for the CIA and hoping to get into black ops. On the night he and his girlfriend, Caroline, become engaged, he's told to pick up Charlie Wax at Orly. Charlie is an unorthodox government employee - large, bald and bearded, foul-mouthed and eccentric. Charlie immediately takes James on a wild ride of murder and mayhem, through ethnic enclaves. As bodies pile up, the purpose remains opaque to James. Caroline, unhappy that James has been out of touch for a day, tells him to bring Charlie for dinner. Charlie can be charming - where will it lead? Does the chess-playing James have what it takes?
